techmeme.title: Car rental app Turo, which uses a risk algorithm to screen drivers, was used to book trucks in both fatal New Year's Day incidents in Las Vegas and New Orleans (Bloomberg)
Anthropic agrees with publishers to stop Claude from providing lyrics to their songs or new lyrics based on copyrighted content, with a court ruling pending (Winston Cho/The Hollywood Reporter)
Paris is vying with London as Europe's top AI hotspot, with 34 of the 40 best-performing startups at the Station F incubator in 2024 focused on AI (John Thornhill/Financial Times)
Terraform Labs co-founder Do Kwon pleads not guilty before a US federal judge in New York to nine counts, including wire fraud, over the $40B TerraUSD collapse (Bob Van Voris/Bloomberg)
Sources: China-backed hackers accessed the computers of senior US Treasury officials; the department's email system and classified data were not breached (Bloomberg)
